data.name: Reimei no Gakuen - Otome/Visual Novel Demo
data.detailed_description: The Final Demo of Reimei no Gakuen contains the first 2 chapters of the story.
data.about_the_game: The Final Demo of Reimei no Gakuen contains the first 2 chapters of the story.
data.short_description: The Final Demo of Reimei no Gakuen contains the first 2 chapters of the story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or higher
  • Processor: IntelÂ® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Adult content includes a few illustrations of characters kissing.
There are also a few illustrations and scenes that show mild violence, blood, and death.
